Class OfficerApplications

java.lang.Object
arrays.OfficerApplications
public class OfficerApplications extends Object
OfficerApplications is a utility class that handles operations related to officer applications. It allows filtering officer applications by project or applicant, as well as managing the officer application list.

  • Method Details

    • getProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getProjects(Officer o)
      Filters officer applications for a specific officer based on a successful status.
      Parameters:
      o - The officer whose applications are being filtered.
      Returns:
      A list of projects the officer has successfully applied to.

    • getAllProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAllProjects(Officer o)
      Gets all projects an officer has applied to, including unsuccessful or withdrawn applications.
      Parameters:
      o - The officer whose applications are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects the officer has applied to.

    • getOfficers

      public static ArrayList<Officer> getOfficers(Project p)
      Retrieves all officers that have successfully applied to a specific project.
      Parameters:
      p - The project to check for officer applicants.
      Returns:
      A list of officers who have successfully applied for the project.

    • filter

      public static ArrayList<OfficerApplication> filter(Project p)
      Filters officer applications for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      p - The project to filter officer applications by.
      Returns:
      A list of officer applications for the specified project.

    • filter

      public static ArrayList<OfficerApplication> filter(Applicant a)
      Filters officer applications by the applicant.
      Parameters:
      a - The applicant whose officer application is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The officer application associated with the given applicant.

    • getOfficerApplication

      public static OfficerApplication getOfficerApplication(int id) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves an officer application by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the officer application.
      Returns:
      The officer application corresponding to the given ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if item is deleted

    • newOfficerApplication

      public static void newOfficerApplication(OfficerApplication officerApplication)
      Adds a new officer application to the list.
      Parameters:
      officerApplication - The officer application to be added.

    • deleteOfficerApplication

      public static void deleteOfficerApplication(OfficerApplication officerApplication)
      Deletes an officer application from the list.
      Parameters:
      officerApplication - The officer application to be deleted.

    • getAllOfficerApplications

      public static ArrayList<OfficerApplication> getAllOfficerApplications()
      Retrieves all officer applications from the list.
      Returns:
      A list of all officer applications.

    • getSize

      public static int getSize()
      Returns the size of the officer application list.
      Returns:
      The number of officer applications in the list.
